text: James Odongo (27 March 1931 â€“ 4 December 2020), was a Ugandan Roman Catholic prelate. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Tororo in Uganda, from 5 January 1985, until his retirement on 27 June 2007. Odongo was born in Tororo District, Uganda. Odongo died on the morning of 4 December 2020, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile of Military Ordinariate of Uganda *Profile of Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Tororo Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ugandan Roman Catholic bishops
title: James Odongo
